<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_72"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:70PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:22PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	E3-5
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Weight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:70PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:70PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The following shall apply to the determination of weights for Natural Uranium Physically Delivered to TENEX and the ***** Cylinder containing such Natural Uranium:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The Parties shall be bound by the cylinder tare weight listed in the CQQ provided by USEC.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The Parties shall also be bound by the gross weight listed on the CQQ;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	, that TENEX may dispute such gross weight if the gross weight determined by TENEX differs from the gross weight determination in the CQQ by more than the "Applicable Dispute Limit", which for this purpose shall mean a difference of ***** from the gross weight in the CQQ, and TENEX notifies USEC of such discrepancy prior to Acceptance of the Natural Uranium. The Parties shall follow the check-weight procedures in Paragraph E3-6 below in resolving any dispute of the gross weight, and the resolution of such disputes in accordance with Paragraph E3-6 shall be final and binding on the Parties. Notwithstanding the existence of a discrepancy in gross weight or a dispute concerning such discrepancy, USEC's gross weight determination shall be final and binding on the Parties if TENEX breaks the seal on, or evacuates any of the Natural Uranium from, the disputed ***** Cylinder prior to either resolution of the discrepancy or USEC's agreement to accept TENEX's gross weight determination.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	For purposes of this Section, "net weight" shall mean the difference between the gross weight of a ***** Cylinder filled with Natural Uranium identified in the CQQ and the tare weight of such cylinder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	All ***** Cylinders have previously been weighed by or for USEC intends to use those weight results without reweighing. If, however, USEC determines that it must reweigh a ***** Cylinder (or cause such cylinder to be reweighed) after execution of Amendment No. 007 to this Contract but before transfer of title to TENEX pursuant to the Cylinder Purchase Contract and, prior to USEC determining that it must reweigh the ***** Cylinder, TENEX has requested in a timely manner an opportunity to observe such reweighing, USEC shall promptly notify TENEX of the date(s) and place(s) for observance of such reweighing and TENEX shall be given an opportunity to observe, at TENEX's expense, the reweighing of the ***** Cylinder. TENEX shall comply with the
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage122"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT_10-19X20151231_HTM_SF79C155099EE4E64AE9194993B1616E2">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	requirements for its observer to gain access to the place where the reweighing will occur.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Any re-weighing of filled ***** Cylinders is to be made with an accuracy of ***** of the gross weight of the filled cylinders, or &#177; *****, whichever is greater.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Any re-weighing of filled ***** Cylinders must be carried out on scales providing the accuracy of weighing not lower than mentioned in item (e) above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:70PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:22PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	E3-6
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Check Weight Procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:70PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:70PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If, in accordance with Paragraph E3-5 of this Appendix, TENEX notifies USEC that the gross weight of a filled ***** Cylinder to which USEC has transferred title to TENEX pursuant to a Cylinder Purchase Contract differs by more than the Applicable Dispute Limit from the gross weight in the CQQ, then, if the discrepancy cannot be resolved by mutual agreement within ***** after USEC receives TENEX's notification (whichever receives the notification last), TENEX shall arrange for a separate weighing of the applicable cylinder to determine the gross weight of such filled cylinder (the &#8220;Check Weighing&#8221; or &#8220;Check Weighed&#8221;). USEC shall have the right to witness the Check Weighing. TENEX shall give USEC at least two weeks' Notice of the time and place for the Check Weighing. The Check Weighing shall be conducted on calibrated scales and weighing machines properly certified for such purpose. The Check Weighing procedure shall be as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_73"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	All Cylinders and/or weights shall be first removed from the scales, and the scales shall be zero-checked.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	A mutually agreed standard weight shall then be placed on the scales in order to verify their accuracy. If the indicated weight of the standard weight differs from its known weight by more than ***** of the standard weight the scales shall be re-calibrated.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The cylinder to be Check Weighed shall be examined to ensure that the valve protector and other removable items have been removed and then it shall be re-weighed. The results of the re-weighing shall be defined as the "Check Weight."
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If the Check Weight and the gross weight determination on the CQQ differ by an amount equal to or less than the Applicable Dispute Limit, USEC's gross weight determination shall be binding.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If the Check Weight and the original gross weight determination on the CQQ differ by more than the Applicable Dispute Limit, the Check Weight shall be binding.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>

</TD>

	(f)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Any costs incurred in connection with this Check Weighing procedure shall be borne by (i) TENEX if USEC's the original gross weight determination on the CQQ is binding, and (ii) USEC in all other cases.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	(g)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If as a result of the Check Weighing it is determined that there is a shortfall in the quantity of Natural Uranium Physically Delivered in the ***** Cylinder as compared to the quantity identified in the CQQ, USEC shall *****
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Neither TENEX nor any party acting on its behalf shall evacuate or break the seal on the valve and plug of a ***** Cylinder about which there is a dispute concerning gross weight until any discrepancy concerning weight is resolved under this Appendix E3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Maximum Permissible Levels of Radiation and Non-fixed Radioactive Contamination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	TENEX shall ensure that the transportation of ***** Cylinders with Natural Uranium shall be effected in accordance with IAEA Safety Standards Series No.TS-R-1, Regulations for the Safe Transport of Radioactive Material, 2009 Edition.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Marking
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_75"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Pursuant to the Cylinder Purchase Contract, each ***** Cylinder shall have a permanent marking (nameplate) at the time title to the ***** Cylinder transfers to TENEX. Thereafter, any changes in labelling shall not be USEC&#8217;s responsibility.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The permanent marking described in Paragraph E3-8(a) shall be made on a metal plate fixed to ***** Cylinder. It shall be non-exchangeable and non-erasable. The permanent marking must contain the data stipulated in ANSI N 14.1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Conversion Coefficient
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The weight of uranium in Natural Uranium indicated in the shipping documentation for a ***** Cylinder shall be determined as the weight of uranium hexafluoride multiplied by a coefficient (Factor F) in the range of *****. Factor F shall be indicated in the CQQ.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Certificate of Quality and Quantity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	All measured and weighing values shall be stated in the CQQ, in kilograms rounded to the nearest integer number of kilograms, taking into account that the first decimal equal or less than 4 leaves the integer unchanged, the first decimal greater than 5 increases the integer by 1, and if the first decimal is equal to 5, the integer is increased by one if the integer is odd while if the integer is even the integer is unchanged.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage124"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT_10-19X20151231_HTM_SF79C155099EE4E64AE9194993B1616E2">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Modification of Forms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:74PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If Physical Delivery is made from a location other than the *****, the references to the ***** shall be adjusted accordingly.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	SECTION 2. Except as amended hereby, the Contract shall remain unchanged and in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	SECTION 3. This Amendment No. 007 may be executed in two or more counterparts, each of which shall constitute an original, but all of which, when taken together, shall constitute one and the same instrument.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties hereto have executed this Amendment No. 007 as of the date first written above.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	USEC Contract No. EC-SC01-11-UE-03127
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Amendment No. 008
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	AMENDMENT No. 008, signed as of December 22, 2015, to the Enriched Product Transitional Supply Contract, TENEX Contract No. 08843672/110033-051, USEC Contract No. EC-SC01-11-UE-03127, entered into on March 23, 2011 (the "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	CONTRACT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	") by and between United States Enrichment Corporation ("
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	USEC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	") and Joint Stock Company "TENEX" ("
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TENEX
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	"). USEC and TENEX are referred to herein individually as a "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	" and collectively as the "
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	". Capitalized terms used but not defined herein shall have the meanings ascribed to such terms in the CONTRACT.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	SECTION 1. Pursuant to Section 20.04 of the CONTRACT, USEC and TENEX hereby agree as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:29PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:5PX;">

	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

	Section 1.18 shall be replaced with the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:29PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Delivered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(a) &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;in reference to Natural Uranium:

</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

	as indicated by the context in which these terms are used, or

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_77"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:96PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8220;3.01
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	TENEX shall supply to USEC, and USEC shall procure from TENEX, EUP containing the following fixed quantities of SWU (&#8220;Firm Commitment SWU&#8221;) shown in column 2 of Table 1A below, subject to the permitted transfer of certain quantities to Delivery Years 2023-26 under Section 3.02 and the increase in those transferred quantities under Section 3.02(c) (defined therein as &#8220;Compensatory Purchases&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	The Parties hereby confirm that their purchase, sale and Delivery obligations under this CONTRACT for Delivery Years prior to 2016 have been satisfied, with the exception of (a) any obligations of USEC to pay invoices for SWU in EUP Delivered in Delivery Year 2015 (the &#8220;2015 EUP&#8221;) that have yet to be fully paid as of the first day by which both Parties executed Amendment No. 008 to the CONTRACT (the &#8220;Amendment 008 Execution Date&#8221;); (b) any obligations of USEC to supply Related Natural Uranium for the 2015 EUP that, as of the Amendment 008 Execution Date, has not already been Delivered under Section 7.02; and (c) any obligations of either Party with respect to the quantity or quality of the 2015 EUP or other Material Delivered in 2015 that has not yet been Accepted as of the Amendment 008 Execution Date.

<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:90PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, USEC shall not be obligated to purchase more than 2.25 million SWU in any Delivery Year after 2022 under this Section 3.02. Instead, USEC shall have the right to defer the purchase of the excess over 2.25 million SWU until the first Delivery Year in which such excess can be purchased without resulting in an obligation for USEC to purchase more than 2.25 million SWU. There shall be no additional compensation in SWU owed for the deferral of such excess.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deadline
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8221;), at its sole discretion and with prior Notice to USEC, to exercise remedies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*****
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	TENEX may invoke the remedy in Section 4.06(c) at any time after the Applicable Purchase Deadline notwithstanding any contrary term in Section 4.06(c), without the need for TENEX either to seek to sell such Purchase Quantity Shortfall to one or more third parties prior to invoking such remedy or to wait until
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*****
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#32;to invoke such remedy. Further, in the case of a Purchase Quantity Shortfall for which TENEX elects the remedy in this Section 4.06(f)(i), the liquidated damages under Section 4.06(a) applicable to such Purchase Quantity Shortfall shall be payable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*****
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#32;after receipt by USEC of the invoice from TENEX for the full period in Section 4.06(a) from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*****
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	, without regard to whether TENEX has sold the applicable Purchase Quantity Shortfall.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	If the Purchase Quantity Shortfall is greater than *****, TENEX may elect the remedy in (A) - (D) below with respect to all or part of the Purchase Quantity Shortfall, at TENEX&#8217;s election (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Immediate Payment Remedy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8221;). This remedy shall apply in lieu of the remedies under Section 4.06(a) and Section 4.06(b), as modified by Section 4.06(f)(i) (collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accelerated Cover Damages Remedy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8221;). The Accelerated Cover Damages Remedy shall still apply to any portion of the Purchase Quantity Shortfall for which TENEX does not elect the Immediate Payment Remedy.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Under the Immediate Payment Remedy, TENEX may invoice USEC the SWU Price applicable to the Shortfall Year under Section 6.01(a) multiplied by the SWU in the portion of the Purchase Quantity Shortfall for which TENEX elects the Immediate Payment Remedy.
</FONT>

<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_84"></A>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:192PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(C)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	After paying the invoice under Section 4.06(f)(ii)(B), USEC shall place one or more Orders for Delivery in the Delivery Year immediately after the Shortfall Year (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Makeup Year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8221;) of Related EUP containing the portion of the Purchase Quantity Shortfall for which TENEX elected the Immediate Payment Remedy (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Prepaid SWU
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8221;). For the avoidance of doubt, in case (other than as a result of an impediment under Section 13.03), USEC does not place one or more Orders for Delivery in the Makeup Year of the whole amount of the Prepaid SWU, USEC shall have no right to place Orders for Delivery of any Prepaid SWU in any year after the Makeup Year.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:192PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	(D)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	For each Delivery in the Makeup Year of the Prepaid SWU USEC shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*****
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#32;after receipt of the TENEX invoice by USEC following each such Delivery, pay to TENEX the positive difference between the SWU Price in the Shortfall Year and the SWU Price in the Makeup Year, if there is such a difference, multiplied by the portion of the Prepaid SWU
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	contained in the respective Delivery. The first SWU ordered for Delivery in the Makeup Year shall be considered to be the Prepaid SWU.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	&#8220;(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;TENEX shall inform USEC of the steps initiated by TENEX as far as these steps concern USEC, and shall use its reasonable efforts to minimize the amounts owed by USEC pursuant to the foregoing provisions of this Section 4.06. To the extent permitted by applicable law and subject to Section 18.09, the foregoing provisions of this Section 4.06 shall be TENEX&#8217;s exclusive remedy for a Purchase Quantity Shortfall or for USEC&#8217;s failure to submit Orders with respect to a Delivery Year, but is without prejudice to any rights or remedies that TENEX may have under this CONTRACT or applicable law with respect to future Delivery Years if USEC does not provide adequate, in TENEX&#8217;s reasonable judgment, assurances that the failure to submit sufficient Orders will not recur in such future Delivery Years.
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT_10-20X20151231_HTM_SFAF05FB2B92B4AB7A3C973ABA7AF1133">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	For the avoidance of doubt, if USEC fails to provide such assurances, TENEX may pursue its rights and remedies under applicable law and this CONTRACT with respect to an anticipated breach of USEC&#8217;s obligation to place Orders in future Delivery Years under the Dispute resolution procedure in Article 18 and any resulting damage award shall be subject to the limitations in Article 11.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	With respect to any Delivery Year in which USEC did not meet its Minimum Firm Purchase Obligation but did meet in a timely manner 100% of its financial obligations under Section 4.06(f) with respect to the Purchase Quantity Shortfall, USEC&#8217;s assurances shall be presumed to be adequate absent credible evidence of fraud or intentional misconduct.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	15.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:13PT;PADDING-LEFT:-2PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	16.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	Appendix J of the CONTRACT is hereby replaced with the revised Appendix J in Exhibit 1 hereto. Appendix P in Exhibit 2 hereto is hereby inserted as a new appendix to the CONTRACT.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	SECTION 2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;This Amendment No.&#160;008 shall take effect upon signature by the Parties and approval by the State Atomic Energy Corporation &#8220;Rosatom&#8221; (&#8220;ROSATOM&#8221;). TENEX shall promptly notify USEC in writing upon receipt of the approval of this Amendment No. 008 by ROSATOM. Except as amended hereby, the CONTRACT, as in effect on the date first written above, shall remain unchanged and in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	SECTION 3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;This Amendment No. 008 may be executed in two or more counterparts, each of which shall constitute an original, but all of which, when taken together, shall constitute one and the same instrument.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:13PT;">
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties hereto have executed this Amendment No.&#160;008 as of the date first written above.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	EXHIBIT 23.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:8PX;PADDING-TOP:8PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<EFX_EXPERTS_CONSENT>
<A NAME="FIS_EXPERTS_CONSENT"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	We hereby consent to the incorporation by reference in the Registration Statement on Form
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#FF0000;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	S-8 (No.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	333-200439) of Centrus Energy Corp. of our reports dated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	March&#160;22, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;relating to the consolidated financial statements which appear in this Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>

	EXHIBIT 31.1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Daniel B. Poneman, certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Centrus Energy Corp.;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">

<TD>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<DIV STYLE="PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;PADDING-TOP:10PX;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Stephen S. Greene, certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Centrus Energy Corp.;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:24PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">

<TD>
</TD>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:12PX;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION OF CEO AND CFO PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the annual report on Form 10-K of Centrus Energy Corp. for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December&#160;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;), pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, Daniel B. Poneman, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Stephen S. Greene, Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer, each hereby certifies, that, to his knowledge:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:78PX;TEXT-INDENT:-42PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:78PX;TEXT-INDENT:-42PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(2)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of Centrus Energy Corp.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
